entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "dotnet restore" and "dotnet publish" use relative BaseIntermediateOutputPath even if it's set to absolute path #46990
  • "@" in path broke "copy always" option for files in .net9 sdk #46987
  • BadImageFormatException referencing an x64 assembly in a "single file" / "self contained" application #46984

PullRequests

Created

  • Minor clean-up in src/Layout/redist #46994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add VMR step to validate asset baseline #46991
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #46989
    untriaged, Area-Workloads, Branch Lockdown
  • Allow to fingerprint Blazor.js #46988
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #46977
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Remove dead code from redist-installer #46978
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use package download in generate layout #46925
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Fix GenerateLayout target dependencies when skipping crossgen #46982
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Fix typo for forwarding the DAC signing arguments #46981
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix GenerateLayout target dependencies when skipping crossgen #46979
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Fix definition of PgoTerm and properties based on Versions #46980
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix typo for forwarding the DAC signing arguments #46959
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix definition of PgoTerm and properties based on Versions #46964
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2646152 #46803
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add installer tests project #46927
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Create trust boundary doc Fixes #45340 #45666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Add project capabilities for publish properties #46221
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Branch Lockdown, 8.0.15
  • Try to re-enable APICompat in aspnetcore #45872
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wasm] Enable previously disabled tests #43073
    Area-WasmSdk, 10.0.1xx
  • Add ExcludeFromCodeCoverage to template for MSTest, NUnit, XUnit #46866
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
